column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Pranavi - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you consider us your "go-to" ramen house
column2: especially given the sharp increase in competition as of late. In the coming months we will open more JINYA outposts
column3: which hopefully will alleviate our extended wait times at Midtown. But above all
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
